name: urea ammonium nitrate production | urea ammonium nitrate mix | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/22631/documentation

This dataset represents the production of 1 kg of urea ammonium nitrate, with 30% N. Urea ammonium nitrate (UAN) is a liquid fertiliser with 28-32 % nitrogen (N) content. Urea ammonium nitrate solutions are produced through mixing and cooling of concentrated urea and ammonium nitrate solutions. Both continuous and batch processes exist. The amount of CO2 recovered from the ammonia synthesis and used in urea production, will be inevitably and completely released back to the atmosphere after application of UAN to the soil.;The main data sources for this dataset are Fertilizers Europe (2014, 2016). Additional data sources are listed as follows.;References:;Fertilizers Europe (2000): Best Available Techniques for Pollution Prevention and Control in the European Fertilizer Industry. Booklet No. 1 of 8: Production of Ammonia. Fertilizers Europe, Brussels.;Kongshaug G. (1998): Energy Consumption and Greenhouse Gas Emissions in Fertilizer Production. IFA 20th July 1998;Davies J., Haglund C. (1999): Life Cycle Inventory of Fertiliser Production. SIK-Report No 654 1999. Chalmers University of Technology, Sweden.;Fertilizers Europe (2014): Average Emissions Year 2011. Fertilizers Europe Environmental report (internal).;Fertilizers Europe (2000): Best Available Techniques for Pollution Prevention and Control in the European Fertilizer Industry. Booklet No. 5 of 8: Production of urea and urea ammonium nitrate. Fertilizers Europe, Brussels.;Fertilizers Europe (2016): Carbon Footprint Calculator for Fertilizer Production. Specification. Version 2.1;Fertilizers Europe (2016): Average Emissions Year 2014. Fertilizers Europe Environmental report (internal). Used for updated energy and GHG emission in Carbon Footprint Calculator

The activity includes all the raw and processed materials necessary to produce this product. Urea, ammonium nitrate, electricity and heat (as fuel oil) are included. Direct emissions of carbon dioxide to air are included.

The activity ends with the final product being ready for transportation at the production site.
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2012:Manufacture of fertilizers and nitrogen compounds

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Primary data were collected on fertiliser production for the year 2011. These data were based on annual average data for the year 2011.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: The dataset is representative of urea ammonium nitrate production in North America, adapted from data collected in European fertiliser plants.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: This datasets corresponds to the technology used in North American fertiliser plants. The production of urea ammonium nitrate involves the combination of urea with ammonium nitrate, using heat and electricity.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: The data were extrapolated from respective data for the geography of Europe, i.e.  production of ammonia and nitric acid are adapted to reflect production in North America.
